title: Iterative Adversarial Attack on Image-guided Story Ending Generation. (arXiv:2305.13208v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: Multimodal learning involves developing models that can integrate information from various sources like images and texts. In this field, multimodal text generation is a crucial aspect that involves processing data from multiple modalities and outputting text. The image-guided story ending generation (IgSEG) is a particularly significant task, targeting on an understanding of complex relationships between text and image data with a complete story text ending. Unfortunately, deep neural networks, which are the backbone of recent IgSEG models, are vulnerable to adversarial samples. Current adversarial attack methods mainly focus on single-modality data and do not analyze adversarial attacks for multimodal text generation tasks that use cross-modal information. To this end, we propose an iterative adversarial attack method (Iterative-attack) that fuses image and text modality attacks, allowing for an attack search for adversarial text and image in an more effective iterative way. translated_title: 图像引导的故事结局生成的迭代对抗攻击
translated_abstract: 多模态学习涉及开发能够整合来自各种来源（如图像和文本）信息的模型。在这一领域中，多模态文本生成是一个关键的方面，它涉及处理来自多个模态的数据并输出文本。图像引导的故事结局生成（IgSEG）是一个特别重要的任务，旨在理解文本和图像数据之间的复杂关系，并生成完整的故事结局文本。不幸的是，最近的IgSEG模型的基础是深度神经网络，这些网络容易受到对抗样本的攻击。当前的对抗攻击方法主要集中在单模态数据上，并未分析用于使用跨模态信息的多模态文本生成任务的对抗攻击。为此，我们提出了一种迭代对抗攻击方法（Iterative-attack），融合了图像和文本模态的攻击，以更有效的迭代方式搜索对抗文本和图像。
tldr: 本文提出了一种迭代对抗攻击方法，通过融合图像和文本模态的攻击，实现了对多模态文本生成任务的对抗攻击搜索，提高了攻击的效果。
